Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsme my wife and 4 teenage neighbors were behind krogers on ferguson at 840 pm sept 28 2012 my wife notice bright yellowish\orange lights we turned around and witnessed one flying in from the east swerved around then and hovered then 2 more appeared and got into formation above each other the lights were spinning get brighter then dimmer they start moving sort of back and forth then appeared to disappear then 1 reappeared to the left and they just disappeared all of a sudden as we made it to little caesars pizza on glenway someone there told us they heard about the same thing i got home and was telling a neighbor and someone yelled out i saw it too then went on to say that they were hovering just above the parking lot where he was sitting and that would be the same area from where we witnessed i got on facebook and someone else post they saw it and another posted they witnessed it happen the night before so that 2 days in a row that this was witnessed ufo's hovering over cincinnati one of the teens we were with videoed the ufo's if the video can be lightened up you would be able to see it clearly
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There was one other sighting in Cincinnati on or around September 28th 2012
